data.birthInProgressNotification: The SMS message that is sent to the parent for a birth notification
data.birthDeclarationNotification: The SMS message that is sent to the parent for a birth declaration
data.birthRegistrationNotification: The SMS message that is sent to the parent for a birth registration
data.birthRejectionNotification: The SMS message that is sent to the parent for a birth declaration rejection
data.deathInProgressNotification: The SMS message that is sent to the parent for a death notification
data.deathDeclarationNotification: The SMS message that is sent to the parent for a death declaration
data.deathRegistrationNotification: The SMS message that is sent to the parent for a death registration
data.deathRejectionNotification: The SMS message that is sent to the parent for a death declaration rejection
data.authenticationCodeNotification: The SMS messsage that is sent continaing a 2-factor authentication code
data.userCredentialsNotification: The SMS message that is sent to a new user with a username and passowrd
data.retieveUserNameNotification: The SMS message that is sent to a user containing a username
data.updateUserNameNotification: The SMS message that is sent to a user to confirm an updated username
